channel.title: Model on AetherAI
channel.description: Recent content in Model on AetherAI

item.title: AlphaFold2 Replication
item.description: A replication of AlphaFold2 architecture (very accurate protein structure prediction model) with a free licensing.

item.title: CLASP
item.description: A CLIP-like model for amino acid sequence prediction.

item.title: GPT-Neo
item.description: An implementation of model & data-parallel autoregressive language models with Mesh Tensorflow for distributed TPUs.

item.title: GPT-NeoX
item.description: An implementation of 3D-parallel autoregressive language models for distributed GPUs.

item.title: Mesh Transformer JAX
item.description: An implementation of model & data-parallel autoregressive language models with JAX and Haiku for distributed TPUs.
